name: Tanks3D
description:
~~Firefox's privacy.resistFingerprinting setting causes issues

Inspired by the classic flash game, a 3D turn-based tanks game. 

Single player or local hot seat multiplayer.

Destructible Terrain.

Controls:

WASD: Move   |    Arrows: Rotate Turret    |   Left Shift/Left Ctrl: Camera Options

Space: Fire

Tanks can't swim

Still a prototype, feedback welcomed

Adding an upgrade system with different weapons and improved capabilities is the next goal, along with improving feedback as to the position of the other tanks
